fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(5,4))

# 盒子属性
boxprops = dict(
    facecolor='#ffaaaa',
    lw=1,
    color='k'
)

# 中线属性
medianprops = dict(
    color='k'
)

# data是一个2维数字列表
_ = ax.boxplot(data, 
               patch_artist=True,
               boxprops=boxprops,
               medianprops=medianprops
            )

ax.set_xticklabels(["A", "B", "C", "D"])
ax.set_ylabel("y / unit")

plt.show()
